lead_paragraph: The National Association of Home Builders/Wells Fargo builder-sentiment index released on Monday fell to 54 this month, down from 56 in April.

headline.print_headline: Home Builder Optimism Dips, but Outlook for Future Is Rosier
headline.main: Home Builder Optimism Dips, but Outlook for Future Is Rosier

snippet: The National Association of Home Builders/Wells Fargo builder-sentiment index released on Monday fell to 54 this month, down from 56 in April.
abstract: National Association of Home Builders/Wells Fargo builder-sentiment index falls to 54 in May, down from 56 in April.
